text: The Batumi Ladies Open is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor Hard courts. The event is classified as a $15,000 ITF Women's Circuit tournament. It has been held in Batumi, Georgia, since 1997. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |-
